title: Allow closing tabs on exit
content: Please add an option to close tabs on exit. If we're security-conscious it seems like that's a no-brainer. Thank you
creator: userminus1

title: Netflix streaming
content: Netflix says I need to update Firefox, Firefox says it is updated. I can't stream from Netflix now.
creator: davefk777

title: Youtube da hızlı arama yapamıyorum.
content: Windowsta firefox üzerinde youtube a girince ç tuşuna basarak direk arama çubuğunu kullanabiliyorum. Linux te ise bu tuş . olarak değişiyor ama firefox ta bunu kullanamıyorum. Diğer tarayıcılarda sorun yok, "." tuşu ile direk arama kısmına gidiyor ama firefox ta bunu yapamıyorum. Ayarlardan yazmaya başlar başlamaz arama yap seçeneği de kapalı.
creator: arif-celik56

title: cosa debbo fare per navigare in Firefox?
content: Ho appena aggiornato Firefox ma non mi appare una finestra che mi consenta di accedere alla ricerca su internet. Cosa debbo fare?
creator: sergio.leombruni

title: firefox nezobrazuje stránky správně - porovnání mobilů mobilmania
content:
na stránkách mobilmania v sekci katalog je možnost porovnání mobilních telefonů když vložím telefony k porovnání nezobrazí se mi možnost přepnout se na samotné porovnání v chromu mi ze spodní části vyjede lišta s výběrem a s tlačítkem zobrazit nevím jak lépe správně technicky a terminologicky problém popsat

další problém mám v - zná li někdo - s Home Assistant - kde se mi nezobrazuje jedna ze stránek, pouze problikne a vrátí se na opouštěnou stránku.

když použiji nový čistý profil zdá se že věci fungují OVŠEM zase mi nefunguje autologin na některé stránky který v původním profilu funguje
creator: dubak.j

title: Streaming video
content: Last night it worked fine but today I went onto Amazon Prime to watch movies or programs and it wouldn't play. It says I need the newest version of firefox to be able to watch. I have it already but no go.
creator: furybakerman

title: programs asking to update FireFox
content:
I have two (so far) websites, e.g. yahoo mail and Intuit, that tell me I need to update FireFox. (Can ignore only Yahoo.) However, I did one update, which blew away all of my add-ons, and I found that I was using latest version.

Does anyone have a solution? Are sites not accepting tracking and ad blocking now? I also use DuckDuckGo for search engine.

Would appreciate some words of wisdom on this.

Thank you, Bonsaibill
creator: bonsaibill

title: Firefox 94.0.2 update not streaming video from Netflix nor Amazon
content: Tell me how to fix it so I don't get errors saying I'm using an outdated version of FF from streaming services.
creator: freddare

title: Constant freezing on MacOS Monterey
content:
I just switched to firefox today from Safari after years. But I am not having a good first impression at all. It constantly goes to Not responding, I've had to force close it like 20 times today already.

I only have two plugins installed and they are mainstream ones. (1password and ublock origin)

MacOS Monterey, m1 max macbook pro
creator: roguesith+ac

title: Password stuff
content:
I almost exclusively browse privately using Duckduckgo/Firefox. I have a few news subscriptions, and other sites which require login each time I open them, which is a bit of a nuisance. Some of them have a "remember me" checkbox, but it doesn't seem to work-I have to log in each time. Is there a way around this? By the way, the "Add Images" button on this page will not let me add a screenshot of the message I am getting.

thanks
creator: jimmy31

title: How do I contact official Mozilla support?
content:
I would like to contact Firefox support, but the best I found on the official site is this "ask the community" thing. Is there a support e-mail or a well hidden web form that I missed?

Thanks, zoliking
creator: zoliking
